pkgmetadata.longdescription: S3cmd lets you copy files from/to Amazon S3(Simple Storage Service) using a simple to usecommand line client. Supports rsync-like backup,GPG encryption, and more. Also supports managementof Amazon's CloudFront content delivery network.Authors:-------- Florent Viard <florent@sodria.com> Michal Ludvig <michal@logix.cz> Matt Domsch (github.com/mdomsch)
